summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5695 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 75th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75289 as amended by Ordinance No. 76825, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
